summary: This bill, the Promoting Apprenticeships through Regional Training Networks for Employers Required Skills Act of 2025 (PARTNERS Act), aims to promote registered apprenticeships and other work-based learning programs for small and medium-sized businesses. It establishes a framework for industry partnerships, provides funding for states to support these partnerships, and outlines requirements for state applications, grant distribution, and performance reporting. The bill focuses on in-demand industry sectors and aims to connect businesses with educational providers and provide support services for workers.
